data.meta_description: WVIT is a television station licensed to New Britain, Connecticut, United States, serving as the NBC outlet for the Hartfordâ€“New Haven market. It is owned and operated by the network's NBC Owned Television Stations division alongside Class A Telemundo outlet WRDM-CD. The two stations share studios on New Britain Avenue in West Hartford and transmitter facilities on Rattlesnake Mountain in Farmington, Connecticut.
